ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cxp0d.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | cxpefd.2 | |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 3 |  | cxpefd.3 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | cxpmul2zd.4 | |- ( ph -> C e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cxpmul2z | |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ A =/= 0 ) /\ ( B e. CC /\ C e. ZZ ) ) -> ( A ^c ( B x. C ) ) = ( ( A ^c B ) ^ C ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ph -> ( A ^c ( B x. C ) ) = ( ( A ^c B ) ^ C ) ) |
